speaker: ADRIANA
text:
I’ll
               
              weep
               
              what’s
               
              left
               
              away
              ,
               
              and
               
              weeping
               
              die
              .

speaker: LUCIANA
text:
How
               
              many
               
              fond
               
              fools
               
              serve
               
              mad
               
              jealousy
              !
